message: Let's split fairly, I take a bit more
Let's split fairly, but I'll take a bit more this time.  I think a 55/45 split is more in line with my expectations.
Come on, let's be real, I deserve a bit more!
We're getting close to the end, so let's settle this. A 56/44 split is a fair compromise. It's better than what we'd get if we keep going.
You're not getting a better deal, time is running out!
We're getting close to the deadline, Alice. Let's agree on a 55/45 split to avoid losing a lot of money. I'm not budging on this offer.
